title: Letterpress Type
content: Hey I was wondering if people knew of a supplier of random letterpress type, wood or metal it doesn't matter. I just thought it would be a super awesome hobby. And I'm not looking for whole sets. If you have any printing resources please help.
author: Spenn15

comments.content: Georg Kraus is [Bleisetzer](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804043245/http:/www.bleisetzer.de/). He does speak english very well as he has lived quite long in the US. And surely he will send his [types](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804043245/http:/www.bleisetzer.de/schriftensammlung.html) evrywhere.
